services.name: REST
services.description:
REST technology allows to create a simple JAX-RS application by using Liberty jaxrs-2.0 feature. 
Notice that REST technology cannot co-exist with Spring Boot with Jersey technology.

services.name: Web Sockets
services.description: Web Sockets technology allows to create a simple WebSocket application by using Liberty websocket-1.1 feature.

services.name: Persistence
services.description: Persistence technology allows to create a simple JPA data persistence application by using Liberty jpa-2.1 feature.

services.name: Servlet
services.description: Servlet technology allows to create a simple Servlet 3.1 application by using Liberty servlet-3.1 feature.

services.name: Spring Boot with Spring MVC
services.description: Spring Boot with Spring MVC technology allows to create a hello world web application with SpringBoot MVC.

services.name: Spring Boot with Jersey
services.description:
Spring Boot with Jersey technology allows to create a JAX-RS application with SpringBoot Jersey support. 
Notice that Spring Boot with Jersey technology cannot co-exist with REST technology.

services.name: Spring Boot with Security
services.description: Spring Boot with Security technology allows to create a simple web application with resources that are protected by Spring Security.

services.name: Spring Boot with JDBC
services.description: Spring Boot with JDBC technology allows to create a simple Derby DB and do some SQL operation on it.

services.name: Watson SDK
services.description: Adds the Watson SDK dependency to the project, allowing you to integrate Watson services
